full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN PO NO MON HANG DKA' CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG BLA MA BLO BZANG SHES RAB DPAL BZANG PO'I SPRUL SKU MYUR BYON GYI SMON TSIG LEGS TSOGS SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES PA 'DI NI BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG GANG GI RDO RJE'I BU SLOB DUS 'KHOR SLOB DPON MDO SNGAGS KYI MNGA' BDAG DGE SLONG DKA' BCU BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL KYIS BSKUL BAR MA ZAD, ,RANG GI 'DUN MOS KYIS KYANG MTSAMS SBYAR TE, ,WA G'INDRA PA tU SIDDHIS BRIS PA BSAM DON 'GRUB PA'I DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
